location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 7 to William Hornby, President and Governor Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports developments from Persia at length including Ally Morad Cahn's [Ali Murad Khan's] capture of Schiras [Shiraz] and Sadoo Cahn's [Sadiq Khan] suicide. The letter also reports various arrivals and departures from Bushire. It is noted that Lapering Sloop,commanded by Lieutenant Thomas Hardie, had arrived from Bussora [Basra] after being dispatched from there in hope of intercepting a christian from Aleppo (on a Galfar boat) suspected of holding French or Dutch packets bound for India.
